Package org.apache.iceberg.flink.maintenance.operator

package org.apache.iceberg.flink.maintenance.operator
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DeleteFilesProcessor
    Delete the files using the FileIO which implements SupportsBulkOperations.
    ExpireSnapshotsProcessor
    Calls the ExpireSnapshots to remove the old snapshots and emits the filenames which could be removed in the ExpireSnapshotsProcessor.DELETE_STREAM side output.
    LockRemover
    Manages locks and collect Metric for the Maintenance Tasks.
    MonitorSource
    Monitors an Iceberg table for changes
    SingleThreadedIteratorSource<T>
    Implementation of the Source V2 API which uses an iterator to read the elements, and uses a single thread to do so.
    TableChange
    Event describing changes in an Iceberg table
    TableChange.Builder
     
    TableMaintenanceMetrics
     
    TriggerEvaluator
     
    TriggerEvaluator.Builder
     
    TriggerManager
    TriggerManager starts the Maintenance Tasks by emitting Trigger messages which are calculated based on the incoming TableChange messages.
